message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth more than the standard market price. I am willing to sell it to you for $14000. Let me know if this offer meets your expectations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $13000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and I am willing to consider it. In response, I propose a counter-counteroffer of $13500 for the product. This price reflects the value I place on the transaction and aims to ensure mutual satisfaction. Please let me know if this proposal works for you.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counter-counter-counteroffer of $13000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I respect your financial considerations and am willing to meet you halfway. My counter-counter-counteroffer is $13250 for the product. This price aims to provide a fair balance between our interests. I hope this suggestion is acceptable to you.
